items.sentence: Tom wanted to tell Mary about what had happened.
Tom will probably be late for work this morning.
Are you telling me you\'ve never studied French?
Tom definitely had problems with his oldest son.
Tom laughed when Mary told him what she\'d done.
Tom left a message on Mary\'s answering machine.
If I did that, everyone would think I was crazy.
I don\'t plan to vote in the upcoming elections.
Let\'s wait here until everybody else goes home.
Mary is the most beautiful woman I\'ve ever met.
Tom told me that you didn\'t tell me everything.
Tom is going to Boston with Mary and her family.
Tom has something he\'d like to say to everyone.
Tom felt that he was destined for bigger things.
Tom found a half-eaten apple behind the toaster.
Tom says that the three of you are his brothers.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t do what we asked him to do.
My older brother did all the preparation for us.
Tom was running down the street drunk and naked.
Tom was the one who helped me break out of jail.
